docs.lead_paragraph: "Related" is a charming show written for women, but represents the weaker "Sex and the City": the strong female character is eliminated from the mix.

headline.main: The Lives of Four Sisters Too Girlish for Their Own Good

docs.lead_paragraph: ON the bus ride from the port in Belize City -- where 250 passengers from a Carnival cruise ship had signed up and paid $93 for the experience of floating in inner tubes through a rain forest cave -- the ground rules were firmly established. Never use your hands when you're going toward the walls (spiders). And try not to freak out if a bat briefly, accidentally, entangles itself in your hair. ''If you see two red eyes coming at you in the cave, please do not leave your tube,'' Peter, the guide, told the group in his Creole lilt. ''There are not alligators in Belize,'' he added reassuringly, then paused for effect. ''Just crocodiles.''
docs.abstract: Christopher Solomon travel article on kayaking, inner-tubing and other adventurous port-of-call activities offered by cruise lines; list; photos (L)
